column7: Introduction to the materials and techniques of printmaking, including intaglio, relief, lithography, and screenprint. Over the course of several projects, students will develop a familiarity with print processes while learning about the unique history and conceptual concerns of print media. Composition and technique are emphasized, and projects that relate to work developed in other studio and design areas are encouraged. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule.
column9: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule.
column11: A student registered in one or more Art & Design course(s) exhibiting this message, will be assessed a $95 facility use fee once each term.
